text: Colegio La Salle Buenos Aires is an Argentine private school founded in 1891 by French Brother Jumaélien (Bernard Athané)La Salle Argentina-Paraguay (2014). Revista Asociados, Año 1, N° 1, mayo de 2014. and located in Balvanera, Buenos Aires City. It belongs to the Institute of the Brothers of the Christian Schools, a Roman Catholic religious teaching congregation created by French priest and educational reformer Jean-Baptiste de La Salle in 1680. Originally established as a boys-only school, nowadays both male and female students attend classes.
